descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Stealing Skyrim - Immersive Stealing v1[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff7700]Description:[/color] You will no longer be able to identify what's stealing and what's not. All visual stealing cues have been removed.
But don't worry if your seen stealing the whole town will hunt you down and kill you...for stealing an apple, happy stealing.

[color=#ff7700]Under the Hood and Compatability:[/color]
    [color=#ff0000]+[/color] Steal has been changed to take (example: steal apple will read take apple).
    [color=#ff0000]+[/color] Steal From has been changed to take from (example: steal from barrel will read take from barrel).
    [color=#ff0000]+[/color] The font color of Steal and Steal From has been change from Red to White (Steal used to be red, now it is Take in white font).
    [color=#ff0000]+[/color] Removes the Red Hand icon when viewing a stolen item from a container or from your Inventory if using SkyUI v4-1. However without SkyUI installed a
       stolen items text will still be red (If you know where the changes need to be made to make the font white let me know).
    [color=#ff0000]+[/color] All service Factions have been modified to allow the vendors to purchase stolen goods. Makes the Speech perk: Fense useless. Mods that create there   ﻿own new service factions will not buy stolen goods, unless the author intended it that way.

    These plugins modify a few Game Settings and every Service Faction.These plugins must be loaded after any other plugins that modify these settings, of
    course.
    [color=#ff0000]= [/color]Game Settings: sSteal and StealFrom. Plus sTopicSubtypeTextCombatSteal and sTopicSubtypeTextCombatStealFromNC, I changed these too but I
       believe they arn't used by the game.
   [color=#ff0000] = [/color]Faction: Services[Name of City][Buisness Name] ----> Example: ServicesMarkarthCastleWizard.

[color=#ff7700]Installation Instructions:[/color]
    The mod is setup as Mod Organizer and Wrye Bash friendly, Simply choose your desired plugins and place in the Skyrim/Data folder.
    The number below [color=#ff7700]Choose[/color] is the folder number in the package, choose only one plugin from the folders with the same number.

   [color=#ff0000]+[/color] [color=#ff7700]Choose One[/color] [color=#ff0000]---->[/color] [b]Stealing - Skyrim[/b] (If you have just Skyrim)
                 00        ﻿ ﻿ ﻿             [color=#ff7700]OR[/color]
                      [b]Stealing - Skyrim USKP[/b] (If you have just Skyrim and are using the Unofficial Skyrim Patch)
                    ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[color=#ff7700]OR[/color]
                      [b]Stealing - Almost Legendary[/b] (If you have Skyrim, Dawnguard DLC and Dragonborn DLC)
                    ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[color=#ff7700]OR[/color]
                      [b]Stealing - Almost Legendary USKP[/b] (If you have Skyrim, The Unofficial Skyrim Patch, Dawnguard DLC and Dragonborn DLC)
                    ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[color=#ff7700]OR[/color]
                      [b]Stealing - Legendary[/b] (If you have Skyrim all of three of the DLC)
                    ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[color=#ff7700]OR[/color]
                      [b]Stealing - Legendary USKP[/b] (If you have Skyrim, The Unofficial Skyrim Patch and all three of the DLC).

          [color=#ff0000]++[/color] [color=#ff7700]Choose[/color] [color=#ff0000]---->[/color] [b]Stealing - Dawnguard[/b] (If you have Dawnguard DLC and not using any of the Legendary plugins).
            ﻿01

         [color=#ff0000]+++[/color] [color=#ff7700]Choose[/color] [color=#ff0000]---->[/color] [b]Stealing - Hearthfires[/b] (If you have the Hearthfire DLC and not using any of the Legendary plugins).
            ﻿02

        [color=#ff0000]++++[/color] [color=#ff7700]Choose[/color] [color=#ff0000]---->[/color] [b]Stealing - Dragonborn[/b] (If you have the Dragonborn DLC and not using any of the Legendary plugins).
            ﻿03
   
       [color=#ff0000]+++++[/color] [color=#ff7700]Choose[/color] [color=#ff0000]---->[/color] Place the [b]Interface/SkyUI/inventorylists.swf[/b] in the Skyrim/Data folder. This removes the Red Hand Icon from containers and from
﻿ ﻿    04             your Inventory if using SkyUI.
             ﻿ ﻿ ﻿If not using SkyUI, the inventorylists.swf will not cause any harm, however any stolen items will be in red text when looked upon in
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿     containers and your Inventory.
             ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[color=#ff0000]*[/color] [b][i]If any one knows where the Red steal text for vanilla Skyrim is located, let me know and I'll try to fix.[/i][/b] [color=#ff0000]*[/color]

[color=#ff7700]The Plugins and Load Order:[/color]
    Stealing - Skyrim
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm

    Stealing - Skyrim USKP
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp

    Stealing - Dawnguard
        [color=#ff0000]Requires: [/color]Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dawnguard.esm

    Stealing - Hearthfires
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Hearthfires.esm
   
    Stealing - Dragonborn
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dragonborn.esm

    Stealing - Almost Legendry
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dawnguard.esm, Dragonborn.esm

    Stealing - Almost Legendary USKP
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp, Dawnguard.esm, Dragonborn.esm

    Stealing - Legendary
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dawnguard.esm, Hearthfires.esm, Dragonborn.esm

    Stealing - Legendary USKP
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp, Dawnguard.esm, Hearthfires.esm, Dragonborn.esm

    Interface/SkyUI/inventorylists.swf
        [color=#ff0000]Requires:[/color] SkyUI v4-1, and must overwrite the inventorylists.swf from SkyUI.

[color=#ff7700]Uninstall Instructions:[/color]
    Remove all of the above listed plugins and inventorylists.swf located in the Data/Interface/SkyUI folder.

[color=#ff7700]Recommended Mods:[/color]
    + SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?
    + Immersive Hud: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?
    + Minimal HUD for Skyrim: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33482/?
    + No Psychic Lock Knowledge: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44115/?
    + No empty tag on empty containers: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31463/?

[color=#ff7700]License:[/color]
[list][*]You may do as you please with the plugins I created, however you must get permission from the SkyUI team to do anything with
inventorylists.swf.[/*]
[/list][color=#ff7700]Credits[/color][list][*]schlangster and the rest of the SkyUI team for allowing use and modification of the inventorylists.swf. [/*]
[/list]
author: Furyfish
